definition: male/Baron, lowest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Changes of neurobehavioral function of male workers could be caused by low intensity noise.
sentences.chinese: 低強度噪聲可引起作業男工神經行爲功能的改變。

sentences.english: The men thanked John Henry for his help.
sentences.chinese: 男工們感謝亨利的幫助。

sentences.english: The company 's hiring more men next week .
sentences.chinese: 該公司下週要再僱些男工。

sentences.english: The builder said his men would start work the next day.
sentences.chinese: 建築商說他的男工第二天就開始幹活。

sentences.english: At the latter laboured quite a company of girls and some men.
sentences.chinese: 工作臺旁許多姑娘和一些男工正在幹活。

definition: working woman/variant of 女紅|女红[nu:3 gong1]
piece rate wage/remuneration based on one's output/opposite: time rate wage 計時工資|计时工资[ji4 shi2 gong1 zi1]
migrant worker/temporary worker enlisted on a public project
odd jobs/servant or army orderly doing odd jobs
to help with farm work/casual laborer
